question: What's OCRM? (Example 1)
answer: OCRM is a CRM system that helps manage leads, deals, tasks, and communication efficiently.

question: Hey siri
answer: Hello Yar

question: Who are you?
answer: I’m Inklidox Child, your smart assistant for OCRM. Ask me anything about your CRM!

question: How many versions does OCRM have? (Example 3)
answer: OCRM has 4 versions: V1.0 (Core), V1.5 (Communication), V2.0 (Integrations), V2.5 (AI).

question: What's in OCRM V1.0? (Example 4)
variants: what i get in v1? ex4
answer: OCRM V1.0 includes lead management, reminders (mail/calendar), dashboard, and user onboarding. Released May 10, 2025.

question: When is V1.0 released? (Example 5)
answer: OCRM V1.0 was released on May 10, 2025.

question: What's new in V1.5? (Example 6)
answer: V1.5 adds dashboards, notifications, file uploads, mail features, and recurring tasks. Released May 31, 2025.

question: What's the release date for V1.5? (Example 7)
answer: OCRM V1.5 was released on May 31, 2025.

question: What's in V2.0? (Example 8)
answer: OCRM V2.0 brings WhatsApp, Google Calendar, Google Meet, OCR, mobile app, and SMS integration. Released June 15, 2025.

question: Is WhatsApp supported? (Example 9)
answer: Yes, WhatsApp integration is available in OCRM V2.0 and above.

question: Can I use Google Calendar? (Example 10)
answer: Yes! Google Calendar integration is available from OCRM V2.0.

question: When was V2.0 released? (Example 11)
answer: OCRM V2.0 was released on June 15, 2025.

question: Tell me about OCRM V2.5 (Example 12)
answer: OCRM V2.5 adds AI tools, no-code form builder, sales forecasting, and voice-to-text notes. Released June 25, 2025.

question: When is V2.5 released? (Example 13)
answer: OCRM V2.5 was released on June 25, 2025.

question: Can I build forms without code? (Example 14)
answer: Yes! Version 2.5 includes a no-code form and field builder.

question: Are AI features available? (Example 15)
answer: Yes, V2.5 includes AI features like sales forecasting and intelligent notes.

question: Can I use voice-to-text? (Example 16)
answer: Yes, in V2.5, you can use voice-to-text for note-taking.

question: Is mobile app available? (Example 17)
variants: can i use on phone? ex17
answer: Yes! A mobile app is available starting from OCRM V2.0.

question: Can I import and export data? (Example 18)
answer: Yes, OCRM V1.5 introduced import & export options for CRM data.

question: Do I get reminders in OCRM? (Example 19)
answer: Yes, from V1.0 you get mail and calendar reminders for leads.

question: Can I attach files to leads? (Example 20)
answer: Yes, V1.5 allows file attachments like invoices, presentations, and spreadsheets.

question: What is the tech stack used? (Example 21)
answer: OCRM uses React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and JWT authentication. Later versions integrate AI and microservices.

question: Is there a dashboard in OCRM? (Example 22)
answer: Yes! Dashboards are available from V1.0 and improved in V1.5 onwards.

question: Can I edit my profile? (Example 23)
answer: Yes, V1.5 added profile editing, password change, and profile image options.

question: Is there an AI assistant in OCRM? (Example 24)
answer: Yes! I'm your built-in assistant, available across OCRM to help anytime.

question: Can I generate reports? (Example 25)
answer: Yes! Report generation is available from V2.0 and fully enhanced in V2.5.

answer: OCRM is a CRM system that helps manage leads, deals, tasks, and communication efficiently.

answer: Yes, OCRM V1.5 introduced import & export options for CRM data.

question: Do I get reminders in OCRM? (Example 194)
answer: Yes, from V1.0 you get mail and calendar reminders for leads.

question: Can I attach files to leads? (Example 195)
answer: Yes, V1.5 allows file attachments like invoices, presentations, and spreadsheets.

question: What is the tech stack used? (Example 196)
answer: OCRM uses React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and JWT authentication. Later versions integrate AI and microservices.

question: Is there a dashboard in OCRM? (Example 197)
answer: Yes! Dashboards are available from V1.0 and improved in V1.5 onwards.

question: Can I edit my profile? (Example 198)
answer: Yes, V1.5 added profile editing, password change, and profile image options.

question: Is there an AI assistant in OCRM? (Example 199)
answer: Yes! I'm your built-in assistant, available across OCRM to help anytime.

question: Can I generate reports? (Example 200)
answer: Yes! Report generation is available from V2.0 and fully enhanced in V2.5.

question: What is CRM? (Q1)
answer: CRM stands for Customer Relationship Management. It helps businesses manage and analyze customer interactions and data.

question: How does CRM help sales teams? (Q2)
answer: CRM helps sales teams track leads, manage customer info, and improve communication for better sales outcomes.

question: Can CRM track customer interactions? (Q3)
variants: can crm follow customer chats? q3
answer: Yes, CRM systems can log emails, calls, meetings, and chat history with customers.

question: What is lead management in CRM? (Q4)
answer: Lead management helps businesses capture, track, and nurture potential customers.

question: Does CRM improve customer service? (Q5)
answer: Yes, CRM helps support teams respond faster and personalize interactions with customers.

question: How to create a leads in OCRM?
answer: To create a lead in OCRM, you'll find a Create Lead option readily available. It's prominently displayed at the top of the OCRM homepage and is also designed to be visible on every page within the system. This ensures you can quickly and easily create a new lead no matter where you are in the OCRM platform.
